column1: The employee begins with a low mental health score of 4 on July 29
column2: indicating difficulty managing their health while successfully starting a new project. Over the following weeks
column3: there is a gradual increase in well-being
column5: as they implement strategies like regular breaks
column7: and delegation that help reduce stress and increase focus. By the end of the reporting period in December
column8: the employee maintains a score of 7
column9: reflecting improved optimism and energy levels despite the challenges faced
column10: with special beliefs evolving towards resilience
